title: Overland AI raises $100M to scale autonomy with the U.S. armed forces
description:
Overland AI is already working closely with formations across the U.S. Army, Marine Corps, and SOCOM to provide autonomous ground systems.

The post Overland AI raises $100M to scale autonomy with the U.S. armed forces appeared first on The Robot Report.
